name: nate is: monkey monkey monkey monkey monkey

content.html: I had the honor of writing a review for the latest Monkey Island release, where @grumpygamer @DavidBFox @phrenopolis, all the team at @terribletoybox, and @SkilletDoux proved that going back is well worth it. I cried when it ended. bit.ly/VGG-Monkey
content.value:
I had the honor of writing a review for the latest Monkey Island release, where @grumpygamer @DavidBFox @phrenopolis, all the team at @terribletoybox, and @SkilletDoux proved that going back is well worth it.

I cried when it ended.

bit.ly/VGG-Monkey
